name: Candy Snatch_ENG
description:
Candy Snatch!

Candy war, the end of friendship!

For Thai Language : https://sgluecan.itch.io/candy-snatch

Game genre : Story, Funny

Play time : About 15-30 minutes 

Warning : Please remove your brain and feel relaxbefore playing the game. 

When Elo Cute Collagen Candy is the last one left. 

With the desire of  'Orange Sin'  that wants to eat of Pun and Yu, therefore, there is a battle for the last candy to replenish the collagen in the skin of both of them.

How will it end!? Who will get the last candy!?

However, the "friendship" between the two now had come to an end. 

Almost all events were in the eyes of Aey, a girl who lost faith in friendship.

Character


Pun  : A girl who is addicted to eating candy. Her favorite brand is Elo Cute, which contains collagen.

Yu  : One of Pun's close friends in the same group. Although the body is male, the heart is female.

Aey : An observer of the events of this game. She lost her faith and no longer believes in friendship. Because she was betrayed by friends and abandoned in childhood.

System :

This is an RPG game with the theme of reading stories.  You can choose to execute the stories and lead to various endings.

Ending :  There are 3 ending

  • Bad End
  • Normal End
  • True End

Bonus.rar

There is a .rar file of Bonus Art. Can open by password that can find at the bonus room after getting the True Ending.
